data.title: Australian Prime Minister, Tony Abbott, to go ahead with $244 million program that introduces religious chaplains to state schools and keeps secular workers out.
NASA confirms that their rocket to Mars will have first launch in 2018
North Korea calls US a "human rights graveyard" over Ferguson.
Ukraine says convoy of 100 Russian tanks have crossed into east
Irreversible Damage Seen From Climate Change in UN Leak
Ukraine Says Russian Forces Lead Major New Offensive

Great Barrier Reef: Australian MP Says He "Got it Wrong" on Dredging Spoil - Admits he was wrong to support dumping of 5m tons of sediment into the Reef's marine park. Writes open letter, saying he's looking at options to dump dredging spoil on land.
Canada to Russia: ‘We will defend our sovereignty in the Arctic’
All schools in Nigeria have been ordered to remain shut until 13 October as part of measures to prevent the spread of the deadly Ebola virus. The new academic year was due to start on Monday.
Rotherham sex abuse scandal: 1,400 children exploited by Asian gangs while authorities turned a blind eye - Telegraph
